findings.rationale: The agreement's indefinite duration may expose the Receiving Party to perpetual obligations, complicating future business operations and limiting flexibility.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect indefinitely and shall survive termination of any business relationship between the parties.

findings.rationale: The vague and broad definition of Confidential Information may lead to disputes about what constitutes confidential material, increasing legal risk.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidential Information means all non-public, proprietary or confidential information disclosed by the Disclosing Party to the Receiving Party.
